This armor sure is heavy."},{"lineNumber":171,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、何をする！　下ろせ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"W-what are you doing? Put me down!"},{"lineNumber":172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サーナキアが女らしくせんから変な話になるのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Because Sarakhia isn't acting feminine, it makes things weird."},{"lineNumber":173,"originalJapaneseLine":"　つまり、俺にたっぷり抱かれて","translatedEnglishLine":"In other words, she should be held and shown her face as a woman,"},{"lineNumber":174,"originalJapaneseLine":"　女の顔を見せてやればいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"So I can see her womanly face."},{"lineNumber":175,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばっ……馬鹿者！　お前、まさか……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You...! You must be kidding...!"},{"lineNumber":176,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今からみんなの前で、たーっぷり愛してやろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"From now, I will love her in front of everyone."},{"lineNumber":177,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とろとろあへあへの顔を晒すがいい。がはははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Show your blissful, loved-up face. Hahaha!"},{"lineNumber":178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃ、ぎゃーーーーーーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, no, stop! Stop, stop, stop!!!"},{"lineNumber":179,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よせ、やめろーーーーーーーー！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Stop, stop right there!!!"},{"lineNumber":180,"originalJapaneseLine":"サーナキアは抵抗虚しく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Sarakhia, despite her resistance,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前という奴は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You, you're such a person...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、騒ぐな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, stop making noise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耳がキンキンしてきたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My ears are starting to ring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だいたい、サーナキアに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, with Sarakhia,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまで干渉する権利があるか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you have the right to interfere that much?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プライベートだぞ。これは自由恋愛だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is private. It's a matter of free love.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「騎士の子たちが総統の俺様に惚れて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The knight's children falling for me, the Supreme Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめて一夜と忍んでくるのを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And even when they harbor feelings for me, just for one night,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はどういう理屈で禁止するんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How can you forbid that with what reasoning?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは、だな、っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, that's...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬言葉に詰まってから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For a moment, she hesitated to speak,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキアはがっくりうなだれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sarakhia slumped her shoulders in disappointment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ま、仕事中でも任務だと命じて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Well, even during work, I order her because it's my duty,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっちゃったりしてるがな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And I do it, but...)
You know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女所帯でそういう事があると……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When women are in a household and such things happen,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空気がおかしくなるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The atmosphere becomes strange.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰と誰が寝たとか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who slept with whom,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰がランス総統の一番かー、とか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And who is the top at General Rance, or something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、もてもてか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, popular, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはつらい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「笑い事じゃない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This isn't a joking matter!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキアの頭が跳ね上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sarakhia's head snapped up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「喧嘩や、悪ければ決闘沙汰にまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It could escalate to a fight, or even a duel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 発展しそうになるんだぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's heading towards serious trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あまつさえ、こっちに話が振られて『興味ない』と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, when the topic is shifted onto me and I answer 'not interested,'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 答えた途端、レズビアン扱いされて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm treated as a lesbian...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それで微妙に距離を取られるボクの気持ちが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And I feel awkwardly distanced from everyone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前に分かるか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can you understand how I feel?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぷっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「笑うなと言っている！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm telling you not to laugh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「笑わせに来たのだと思ったぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought you came to make me laugh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「不埒な生活を慎めと言いに来たんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm here to tell you to refrain from your inappropriate lifestyle!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「成長がないな。そんな事を言われて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You haven't grown at all. Do you think I would just agree when you say that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺がはいそーですかと頷くとでも思ったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you think I would just nod and say 'Yes, sir'?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐ、ぐぅっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guh...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、決闘だ！　ボクが勝ったら……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's have a duel! If I win...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう言って負けるいつものパターンじゃないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the usual pattern where I say that and lose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それじゃ俺に好きにさせてるのと変わらんぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's no different from just letting me do as I please.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しょ、勝負は、時の運……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, the outcome is up to chance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝ち目が薄いからといって、騎士が引けるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A knight won't back down just because the chances are slim!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあまあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより、一発で諸問題を解決する策があるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, I have a way to solve all these problems in one go.
...What? Is it true?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、本当だ……っと、よいこらしょーっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, it's true... Now, here goes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どわーーーーっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはサーナキアを肩に担ぎ上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance slung Sarakhia over his shoulder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む。やっぱ重いな、この鎧」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm. This armor sure is heavy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、何をする！　下ろせ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what are you doing? Put me down!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サーナキアが女らしくせんから変な話になるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because Sarakhia isn't acting feminine, it makes things weird.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つまり、俺にたっぷり抱かれて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In other words, she should be held and shown her face as a woman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の顔を見せてやればいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I can see her womanly face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばっ……馬鹿者！　お前、まさか……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You...! You must be kidding...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今からみんなの前で、たーっぷり愛してやろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now, I will love her in front of everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とろとろあへあへの顔を晒すがいい。がはははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Show your blissful, loved-up face. Hahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃ、ぎゃーーーーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, no, stop! Stop, stop, stop!!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よせ、やめろーーーーーーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stop, stop right there!!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキアは抵抗虚しく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sarakhia, despite her resistance,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前という奴は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You, you're such a person...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、騒ぐな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, stop making noise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耳がキンキンしてきたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My ears are starting to ring.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, with Sarakhia,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you have the right to interfere that much?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プライベートだぞ。これは自由恋愛だ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The knight's children falling for me, the Supreme Commander,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And even when they harbor feelings for me, just for one night,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はどういう理屈で禁止するんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How can you forbid that with what reasoning?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは、だな、っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, that's...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬言葉に詰まってから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For a moment, she hesitated to speak,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキアはがっくりうなだれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sarakhia slumped her shoulders in disappointment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ま、仕事中でも任務だと命じて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Well, even during work, I order her because it's my duty,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっちゃったりしてるがな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And I do it, but...)
You know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女所帯でそういう事があると……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When women are in a household and such things happen,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空気がおかしくなるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The atmosphere becomes strange.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰と誰が寝たとか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who slept with whom,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰がランス総統の一番かー、とか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And who is the top at General Rance, or something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、もてもてか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, popular, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはつらい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「笑い事じゃない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This isn't a joking matter!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキアの頭が跳ね上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sarakhia's head snapped up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「喧嘩や、悪ければ決闘沙汰にまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It could escalate to a fight, or even a duel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 発展しそうになるんだぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's heading towards serious trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あまつさえ、こっちに話が振られて『興味ない』と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, when the topic is shifted onto me and I answer 'not interested,'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 答えた途端、レズビアン扱いされて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm treated as a lesbian...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それで微妙に距離を取られるボクの気持ちが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And I feel awkwardly distanced from everyone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前に分かるか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can you understand how I feel?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぷっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「笑うなと言っている！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm telling you not to laugh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「笑わせに来たのだと思ったぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought you came to make me laugh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「不埒な生活を慎めと言いに来たんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm here to tell you to refrain from your inappropriate lifestyle!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「成長がないな。そんな事を言われて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You haven't grown at all. Do you think I would just agree when you say that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺がはいそーですかと頷くとでも思ったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you think I would just nod and say 'Yes, sir'?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐ、ぐぅっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guh...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、決闘だ！　ボクが勝ったら……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's have a duel! If I win...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう言って負けるいつものパターンじゃないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the usual pattern where I say that and lose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それじゃ俺に好きにさせてるのと変わらんぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's no different from just letting me do as I please.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しょ、勝負は、時の運……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, the outcome is up to chance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝ち目が薄いからといって、騎士が引けるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A knight won't back down just because the chances are slim!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあまあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより、一発で諸問題を解決する策があるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, I have a way to solve all these problems in one go.
...What? Is it true?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、本当だ……っと、よいこらしょーっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, it's true... Now, here goes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どわーーーーっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはサーナキアを肩に担ぎ上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance slung Sarakhia over his shoulder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む。やっぱ重いな、この鎧」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm. This armor sure is heavy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、何をする！　下ろせ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what are you doing? Put me down!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サーナキアが女らしくせんから変な話になるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because Sarakhia isn't acting feminine, it makes things weird.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つまり、俺にたっぷり抱かれて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In other words, she should be held and shown her face as a woman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の顔を見せてやればいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I can see her womanly face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばっ……馬鹿者！　お前、まさか……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You...! You must be kidding...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今からみんなの前で、たーっぷり愛してやろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now, I will love her in front of everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とろとろあへあへの顔を晒すがいい。がはははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Show your blissful, loved-up face. Hahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃ、ぎゃーーーーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, no, stop! Stop, stop, stop!!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よせ、やめろーーーーーーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stop, stop right there!!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキアは抵抗虚しく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sarakhia, despite her resistance,
